title: COMING MARCH 19TH
description: Marcia Hardesty (AnnaSophia Robb) teams up with legendary photojournalist Phil Sheldon (Seth Barish) and his investigative partner Ben Urich (Method Man) to comb through the aftermath of Galactus' arrival in Manhattan and his fight with The Fantastic Four in this new retelling of the seminal graphic novel by Kurt Busiek and Alex Ross. Listen wherever you get your podcasts on Thursday, March 19th. For more information go to marvelspodcast.com.
author: originals@stitcher.com (MARVELS)
